subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: With the hype behind him, Freddy Adu has reached a career crossroads as a playmaking midfielder on the U.S. men’s Olympic team that is preparing for this week’s qualifying matches.
snippet: With the hype behind him, Freddy Adu has reached a career crossroads as a playmaking midfielder on the U.S. men’s Olympic team that is preparing for this week’s qualifying matches.
